definition: to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
to transfer (ownership, rights etc)
to transfer (one's property or rights to sb else)
to concede/to give in/to yield/a concession/(linguistics) concessive
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
to make way (for sth)
to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
to give up one's seat for sb
to abdicate/to yield
to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to show consideration for (others)/to yield to (another vehicle etc)/courtesy/comity
to modestly decline
Abidjan (city in Ivory Coast)
neither giving way to the other
to exercise forbearance/patient and accommodating
to get out of the way/to step aside

sentences.english: The positive side effect is, that the seed of Roridula can be stored for many years.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性，可以让捕虫树的种子保存数年。

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔里燃烧着一团火焰，让人想到奥林匹克圣火。

sentences.english: You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你们务必不要让孩子接触危险物品。

sentences.english: MBL's work is truly amazing, thank you for letting me be a part of it.
sentences.chinese: MBL的工作确实是惊人的，谢谢你让我成为一部分。

sentences.english: It takes away our edge, makes us groggy, and disrupts our sleep.
sentences.chinese: 它让我们反应迟钝，头昏脑胀，扰乱我们的睡眠。

sentences.english: Horses should be walked for a while after a race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛后，应让马慢走一会儿。

sentences.english: You do not want to let them down...
sentences.chinese: 你的的确确不想让他们失望。

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 谁让你起得这么晚，整个赤血宫就你这个时辰才起床。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 许多最基本的职场失误会让他们摔跟头，这让我困惑。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 许多最基本的职场失误会让他们摔跟头，这让我困惑。

sentences.english: Thee sight of these pictures made me remember my own childhood.
sentences.chinese: 看到这幅画让我想到了我的童年时代。

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 里德说，有时候信息的缺乏会让员工误以为老板偏心。

sentences.english: Someone you least expect could be trying to make you look bad.
sentences.chinese: 有人可能会想让你出丑，这个人是你意想不到的。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也许要的不多，只是想让你陪陪她。

sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 总之，只要让我在第戎下火车就行。

sentences.english: It's edited by Jahan Ramazani, formerly a Teaching Fellow in this course.
sentences.chinese: 由之前的一个教学人员让，拉马扎尼所编。

definition: see 令狐[Ling2 hu2]
classifier for a ream of paper
see 脊令[ji2 ling2]
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
surname Ye
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
usable/workable/feasible/doable/to make/to cause
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to supply/to provide
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
because/owing to/on account of
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
more (than sth else)/even more
more/even more/further/still/still more
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
surname Du
capital city/metropolis
thus/consequently/as a result
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
